about-title.description: Title for Zetter Gallery About Page

about-zetter-description.defaultMessage: Zetter is Minecraft mod for creating paintings in minecraft. It allows players to draw paintings in game with ol' MS Paint-line UI. Paintings can be combined for up to 4x4 blocks, wrapped in a frame and put on wall. This should add some cozy feeling for you home.

about-zetter-gallery.description: Title for Zetter Gallery About Section

about-zetter-gallery-description.defaultMessage: Zetter Gallery is a mod and a place to share your Zetter artworks with the world. With Zetter Gallery mod, the Painting Merchant is added, that allows you to sell and purchase popular paintings on Zetter Gallery

about-zetter-gallery-mod-wiki-link.defaultMessage: Check out Zetter Gallery mod wiki page with recipes and manuals
about-zetter-gallery-mod-wiki-link.description: Link to Zetter Gallery wiki from About Zetter page

about-zetter-mod-wiki-link.defaultMessage: Check out Zetter mod wiki page with recipes and manuals
about-zetter-mod-wiki-link.description: Link to Zetter wiki from About Zetter page

auth-check-title.defaultMessage: How to make sure I am safe?

microsoft-auth-check-advice.defaultMessage: Good you asked! Always check the domain in your browser when writing passwords. On this step, you can be redirected to "zettergallery.onmicrosoft.com" or "login.live.com" first if you're not logged into microsoft account. If domain matches, everything is alright.
microsoft-auth-check-advice.description: Explain how to make sure it's not a phishing page

microsoft-auth-disclaimer-track.defaultMessage: This is also used track what paintings you purchase in order to keep feed relevant. Do not worry, we keep your activity data only for a week.
microsoft-auth-disclaimer-track.description: Explain how we track player activity

microsoft-auth-disclaimer-why.defaultMessage: We need this to make sure that you have access to the player account that can be used for submitting paintings. This allows you to have personal feed with your favorite paintings and check your paintings stats.
microsoft-auth-disclaimer-why.description: Why do we need player to authorize us with Microsoft account

paintings-sort-top.description: Sort paintings by total sales count

profile-earnings-amount.description: Amount of total emeralds spent on player's paintings showing in player's profile

profile-favorites-count.description: Amount of favorite marks put on player's paintings in player's profile

profile-paintings-count.description: Amount of submitted paintings showing in player's profile

zetter-wiki-home-combining-interface-gri.defaultMessage: Place your canvases here in order to glue them together. You can also just put one canvas here.

zetter-wiki-home-combining-interface-nam.defaultMessage: Use it to name your painting.

zetter-wiki-home-combining-interface-pre.defaultMessage: Shows how combined painting will look like.

zetter-wiki-home-combining-interface-res.defaultMessage: When you're happy with the result, grab your painting from there. Congratulations! First masterpiece is done.

zetter-wiki-home-combining-text-intro.defaultMessage: When you finished with one or multiple parts of your artwork, it's time to combine canvases and put your author signature. Shift+Right-click on easel will take canvas back from easel to your inventory. Right-click the Artist Table to open combine & signing interface:

zetter-wiki-home-crafting-text.defaultMessage: First, we need to craft some things. Some canvases, an easel to put canvas on, some paints and finally, palette.
zetter-wiki-home-crafting-text.description: Explain first step, what we will be crafting

zetter-wiki-home-framing-text-finish.defaultMessage: What are you waiting for? Place it on the wall!
zetter-wiki-home-framing-text-finish.description: Call to action with first painting

zetter-wiki-home-framing-text-intro.defaultMessage: After signing and naming your painting, it's time to place it somewhere in your fancy house finally! In order to do that, we would need to create a special frame and put the painting into this frame, then place it on wall.

zetter-wiki-home-painting-interface-hex-.defaultMessage: If you know the code of the color you want to use, simply write or copy it there.

zetter-wiki-home-painting-interface-hsv-.defaultMessage: Drag sliders to adjust selected color.

zetter-wiki-home-painting-interface-pale.defaultMessage: Colors are saved with palette item. Current palette slot is higlighted, you can save up to 14 colors in a single palette.
2) Click any slot to use and adjust color
Put your crafted palette here in order to start drawing.

zetter-wiki-home-painting-interface-tool.defaultMessage: You may want to start with bucket to create a background.

zetter-wiki-home-painting-text-intro.defaultMessage: Time to create your first masterpiece! Let me introduce how drawing interface works. It's simple as old good MS Paint, here's the reference:

zetter-wiki-home-preparing-text-mounting.defaultMessage: With canvas in hand, right-click on easel to mount it.

zetter-wiki-home-preparing-text-start.defaultMessage: To start drawing, we would need to prepare our painting workshop. Place the easel, grab canvas, put palette in your hotbar. You can also place artist table somewhere nearby - we will need it later.
zetter-wiki-home-preparing-text-start.description: Explain what we need to start drawing

zetter-wiki-home-preparing-text-workshop.defaultMessage: Our workshop should look like this:

zetter-wiki-home-title.description: Title for Zetter Wiki Home Page

zetter-wiki-recipes-title.description: Title for Zetter Wiki Recipes Page
